data.text: Ah, there you are! Oi!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Ah, there you are! Oi!!

data.text:
Hey you, you're one of the trainers that talked to 
me after my Selection Race, right? I'm right, aren't I!?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Hey you, you're one of the trainers that talked to 
<story>me after my Selection Race, right? I'm right, aren't I!?

data.text: Well I'm holding a test right now, so come with me!
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text: A test!? What's this all of a sudden!?
A test!? What's this all of a sudden!?

data.processed: <story>Well I'm holding a test right now, so come with me!

data.text:
Well, after the race, Prez said to "find a trainer that I could 
rely on, and to only choose one after careful consideration".
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Well, after the race, Prez said to "find a trainer that I could 
<story>rely on, and to only choose one after careful consideration".

data.text:
If that's the case, the quickest way to decide 
is to do a training session with them, doncha 
think? So I'm holding the test today! Show me 
how good of a trainer you really are♪
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>If that's the case, the quickest way to decide 
<story>is to do a training session with them, doncha 
<story>think? So I'm holding the test today! Show me 
<story>how good of a trainer you really are♪

data.text:
And just like that my one day of 
training Tokai Teio had suddenly begun…
data.processed:
<story>And just like that my one day of 
<story>training Tokai Teio had suddenly begun…

data.text:
Hmm, "hopping"? So you want me to hop over each 
of these hurdles, all while staying on one leg…?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Hmm, "hopping"? So you want me to hop over each 
<story>of these hurdles, all while staying on one leg…?

data.text: This seems super fun! What time should I aim for?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>This seems super fun! What time should I aim for?

data.text:
I showed her the time I recommended. 
I set this time to be shorter than 
for the average Uma Musume…
data.processed:
<story>I showed her the time I recommended. 
<story>I set this time to be shorter than 
<story>for the average Uma Musume…

data.text:
Hmm, I have that long? This'll be a piece of 
cake! Here I go!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Hmm, I have that long? This'll be a piece of 
<story>cake! Here I go!

data.text:
Even though she looked like she was merrily 
jumping around, Tokai Teio came in much faster 
than the target time!
data.processed:
<story>Even though she looked like she was merrily 
<story>jumping around, Tokai Teio came in much faster 
<story>than the target time!

data.text:
Phew… Hey, is that all you've got for me? I can 
still go for much more!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Phew… Hey, is that all you've got for me? I can 
<story>still go for much more!

data.text:
Afterwards, I coached Tokai Teio through various 
different regimens, but she greatly exceeded 
expectations in every single one of them!
data.processed:
<story>Afterwards, I coached Tokai Teio through various 
<story>different regimens, but she greatly exceeded 
<story>expectations in every single one of them!

data.text:
And finished!! How was that? I bet I put 
up better times than anyone else, right?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>And finished!! How was that? I bet I put 
<story>up better times than anyone else, right?

data.text:
I am, aren't I? Ehehe, feel free to praise 
the unbeaten Teio-sama more and more!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>I am, aren't I? Ehehe, feel free to praise 
<story>the unbeaten Teio-sama more and more!

data.text:
Yup. No one's ever beaten me at anything 
ever. Regardless of the type of race, 
I've won them all, and every time I won 
I was praised by everyone!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Yup. No one's ever beaten me at anything 
<story>ever. Regardless of the type of race, 
<story>I've won them all, and every time I won 
<story>I was praised by everyone!

data.text:
Being praised feels so good, don't you think? 
They praise me because they think I'm amazing!♪
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Being praised feels so good, don't you think? 
<story>They praise me because they think I'm amazing!♪

data.text:
For example, when I won my first 
race everyone told me that I did amazing!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>For example, when I won my first 
<story>race everyone told me that I did amazing!

data.text: And it felt so, so good!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>And it felt so, so good!

data.text:
If I'm able to enter the Twinkle Series, 
more and more people will think that I'm great!
data.name: Tokai Teio

choices.text:
And that's why you 
joined Tracen Academy?
choices.processed:
<size=37>And that's why you 
joined Tracen Academy?</size>

data.processed:
<story>If I'm able to enter the Twinkle Series, 
<story>more and more people will think that I'm great!

data.text: Ding ding ding!! You're absolutely correct♪
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Ding ding ding!! You're absolutely correct♪

data.text:
Nngh! I'm so excited!! I wanna enter a GI race 
as soon as possible!! I want to be called the 
number one Uma Musume!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Nngh! I'm so excited!! I wanna enter a GI race 
<story>as soon as possible!! I want to be called the 
<story>number one Uma Musume!

data.text:
In her eagerness, Tokai Teio doesn't 
even consider the possibility of losing.
data.processed:
<story>In her eagerness, Tokai Teio doesn't 
<story>even consider the possibility of losing.

data.text:
However, after seeing just how amazing she really is, 
it's hard to find myself thinking that she'd actually lose.
data.processed:
<story>However, after seeing just how amazing she really is, 
<story>it's hard to find myself thinking that she'd actually lose.

data.text:
Oh wait, we were in the middle of the test, 
right? Hey! Is that all you had planned for 
today's regimen? Is it time to cool down?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Oh wait, we were in the middle of the test, 
<story>right? Hey! Is that all you had planned for 
<story>today's regimen? Is it time to cool down?

data.text:
In order to fully understand 
Tokai Teio's abilities, I had one thing left…

choices.text:
To finish up, I would like to 
time you on a 2500 meter race.
choices.processed:
<size=27>To finish up, I would like to 
time you on a 2500 meter race.</size>

data.processed:
<story>In order to fully understand 
<story>Tokai Teio's abilities, I had one thing left…

data.text:
2500 meters? That's where I'm best! Ah, so you 
wanna see how well I do when I'm most comfortable?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>2500 meters? That's where I'm best! Ah, so you 
<story>wanna see how well I do when I'm most comfortable?

data.text: Okay! I'll be back in a flash♪
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Okay! I'll be back in a flash♪

data.text: How was my time?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>How was my time?

data.text: Oh, a new personal best! Yay♪
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Oh, a new personal best! Yay♪

data.text: 2500 meters, huh? Just like the Arima Kinen GI race.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>2500 meters, huh? Just like the Arima Kinen GI race.

data.text: Huh, Prez!?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Huh, Prez!?

data.text: Why're you here? Did you come to see me!?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Why're you here? Did you come to see me!?

data.text: Well, sort of.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>Well, sort of.

data.text:
More importantly… hmm… 
Trainer-kun, I apologize for the sudden 
request, but could you time me as well?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>More importantly… hmm… 
<story>Trainer-kun, I apologize for the sudden 
<story>request, but could you time me as well?

data.text: Make it the same as Teio's, 2500 meters.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>Make it the same as Teio's, 2500 meters.

data.text:
Eh? You're gonna go for a run too, Prez!? 
Yaay!! You'll do it, right, Trainer!?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Eh? You're gonna go for a run too, Prez!? 
<story>Yaay!! You'll do it, right, Trainer!?

data.text: Thanks. I'll start now.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>Thanks. I'll start now.

data.text: Phew… Trainer-kun, what was my time?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>Phew… Trainer-kun, what was my time?

data.text: Prez… You were 2 seconds faster than me…!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Prez… You were 2 seconds faster than me…!

data.text: Correct, it seems like you've lost this time, Teio.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>Correct, it seems like you've lost this time, Teio.

data.text:
Yup, guess I lost! You're amazing, Prez!! 
You really are the strongest Uma Musume, huh!?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Yup, guess I lost! You're amazing, Prez!! 
<story>You really are the strongest Uma Musume, huh!?

data.text: Is that it?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>Is that it?

data.text: Eh? Huh?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Eh? Huh?

data.text:
Yeah… I'll say it once again, Teio. 
You lost to me, did you not?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Yeah… I'll say it once again, Teio. 
<story>You lost to me, did you not?

data.text:
Eh, err? Umm, yes I did. 
And that's why I said you're amazing… eh?
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Eh, err? Umm, yes I did. 
<story>And that's why I said you're amazing… eh?

data.text:
I see… Well, don't worry about it. 
Sorry for being so sudden.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>I see… Well, don't worry about it. 
<story>Sorry for being so sudden.

data.text:
Teio, are you finished with your training? 
Then instead of cooling down, why 
don't you go for a jog outside of campus?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Teio, are you finished with your training? 
<story>Then instead of cooling down, why 
<story>don't you go for a jog outside of campus?

data.text: Ah, sure! Trainer, I'll see you later!!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed: <story>Ah, sure! Trainer, I'll see you later!!

data.text:
Now then, I know it's sudden, but 
I've got something to ask you, Trainer-kun.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Now then, I know it's sudden, but 
<story>I've got something to ask you, Trainer-kun.

data.text: What did you think of Teio's demeanor?
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>What did you think of Teio's demeanor?

data.text:
Her soft-spoken manner with which 
she asked her question was daunting.
data.processed:
<story>Her soft-spoken manner with which 
<story>she asked her question was daunting.

data.text:
Tokai Teio has overwhelming power and unending 
ambition, however, she thinks of her idol as the 
inevitable winner in any match, and as such she 
holds no regret at losing. Which means…

choices.text: If she continues like this, it'll be a waste…
choices.processed: <size=39>If she continues like this, it'll be a waste…</size>

data.processed:
<story>Tokai Teio has overwhelming power and unending 
<story>ambition, however, she thinks of her idol as the 
<story>inevitable winner in any match, and as such she 
<story>holds no regret at losing. Which means…

data.text:
Ah, I see. A "waste", huh? As expected 
of an academy trainer, you have a keen eye.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>Ah, I see. A "waste", huh? As expected 
<story>of an academy trainer, you have a keen eye.

data.text:
But you're right. If she continues like 
this, Teio will limit her own abilities. 
As an Uma Musume aiming to be the best, 
that would be unfortunate.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>But you're right. If she continues like 
<story>this, Teio will limit her own abilities. 
<story>As an Uma Musume aiming to be the best, 
<story>that would be unfortunate.

data.text: Alright, I've decided. I've got a favor to ask of you.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>Alright, I've decided. I've got a favor to ask of you.

data.text: I plan to race with Teio soon, and when that time comes…
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>I plan to race with Teio soon, and when that time comes…
